GSD.description:
lockdown: also lock down previous kgdb use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.197 by commit 8bb828229da903bb5710d21065e0a29f9afd30e0. For more details please see the references link.
